article.title: ERRATA
article.abstract: “Entry, Control and The Market for Bank Charters,” by Stuart I. Greenbaum and Mukhtar M. Ali, appearing in the May, 1974 Papers and Proceedings, contained many typographical errors. The authors will provide corrected versions of the paper upon request.

article.title: Book Reviews
article.abstract:
Book reviewed in this article:
An Introduction to Managerial Finance. By Harold Bierman, Jr. and Jerome E. Hass.
Financial Management—Theory and Techniques. By George C. Philippatos.
The Cost of Capital to a Public Utility. By Myron J. Gordon.
Investment Management. By Harry C. Sauvain.
Financial Markets: The Accumulation and Allocation of Wealth. By Roland I. Robinson and Dwayne Wrightson.
The Euro‐Dollar System, 5th Edition. By Paul Einzig.
The Euro‐Dollar Market and the International Financial System. By Geoffrey Bell.
Private Foreign Investment in Development. By Grant Reuber, with H. Crookell, M. Emerson and C. Gallais‐Hamonno.
Keynes and the Monetarists. By Sidney Weintraub.
Instruments of Monetary Policy in the United States. By Ralph A. Young.
